item.title: Help me [pi]
item.dc:creator: @classy_zezima classy zezima
item.description:
@classy_zezima wrote:

What are the basic ways to make a command, Such as kill command/give item command.

I figured this would work for the kill command but iâ€™m not sure where to start.

if(command.startsWith("givedeath") && (playerRights >= 2)) {
String name = command.substring(10);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.deathStage = 1;
yell(name+" has been @dre@slayed.");
} catch(Exception e) {
sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist");
}
}
